com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui

Class ServerConnectionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.ServerConnectionProvider

  • public class ServerConnectionProvider
extends Object
    The class ServerConnectionProvider provides and caches connections to Acrolinx Server. Note: Remember to shut down all server connections by calling shutdown(). This could be done by GuiFactory.shutdown().

      • testConnection

        public ValidationResult testConnection(ConnectionSettings connectionSettings,
                              LocalizedCancelableProgressMonitor monitor,
                              boolean useNewAuthToken)
        Parameters:
        connectionSettings -
        monitor -
        useNewAuthToken - set this to true if you want to test the connection with a new authentication token. That is helpful when the password or user name has been changed. If the connection cannot be established, the old authentication token will be reset. If it succeeds the new authentication token will be kept
